author: hengne
body:
This PR collectively back ported the following changes:
[Tested with full set of relval workflows with IB CMSSW_7_4_X_2015-09-22-1100]

1.) back port the following new workflows from 76x and 75x:  
    - replace LM1_sfts_13 by SMS-T1tttt_mGl-1500_mLSP-100_13
    - replace Cosmics_UP15 by CosmicsSPLoose_UP15
    - replace BuJpsiK_13, BuToKstarMuMu_13, BuToKstarPsi2S_13 by PhiToMuMu_13, EtaBToJpsiJpsi_13, and BuMixing_13

```
The back porting includes all necessary gen-card and configuration files. 
```

2.) back port the structure re-organization of the Relval scripts from 75x and 76x, i.e. PR #10558 by @boudoul

3.) Back port newly added 2015C 25ns data workflows. Also including the following fixes:
    - fix "LumiList" selection of the lumi blocks
    - update 2015 golden Jason file that cover 2015B+C runs.
    - fix HLT DQM plot filling issue for 25ns 2015c data: "L1REPACK"=> "L1REPACK:GT2"

4.) replace deprecated raw input files for three 2012 data workflows: 
        ZElSkim2012B, ZElSkim2012C, and ZElSkim2012D 

5.) remove experimental dqm gui url for plots output.
title: backport: relval scripts update, 2015c data workflows, 75x 76x new workflows
